text: Painter Babu is a 1983 Indian Hindi-language film directed by Ashok V. Bhushan, starring Rajiv Goswami, Meenakshi Sheshadri and Neelima in lead roles. ==Plot== ==Cast== *Rajiv Goswami *Meenakshi Sheshadri *Neelima *Rakesh Bedi ==Soundtrack== ==References== ==External links== * Category:1983 films Category:1980s Hindi-language films Category:Indian films
title: Painter Babu
